name: Coffee Break (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Coffee Break (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Kennon C. and Anna O.

Welcome to the break room! Here, you can chat with some inter-dimensional creatures who're all in dire need of a rest from their worlds. As a lonely voidling, you're quite curious to find out about their respective worlds and lives. Have fun!

Press the X key to start and progress through text and the Q key to end your break room experience. Press the escape key if you find yourself in need of a quick reset.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
